subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Jeff Luhnow, the new general manager of the Astros, hopes to build on his success drafting players for the Cardinals as he begins to rebuild the worst team in baseball in 2011.
snippet: Jeff Luhnow, the new general manager of the Astros, hopes to build on his success drafting players for the Cardinals as he begins to rebuild the worst team in baseball in 2011.
